name: Jazzy Dice
description:
Help a merry band of aspiring musicians with their breakout performance!

Provide "musical inspiration" by tossing dice at them.

Note from the team

Thank you so much for taking the time to try out our game! 

Unfortunately, we weren't able to finish making the game as we envisioned it, but we hope you will be able to get an idea of what we had hoped to put out.

P.S. Might wanna adjust the volume on your device before launching the game!
